definition: a piece of furniture that provides a place to sleep, to have sexual intercourse with
details:
noun
- a piece of furniture that provides a place to sleep
= example: a piece of furniture that provides a place to sleep
- a plot of ground in which plants are growing
= example: a plot of ground in which plants are growing
- a foundation of earth or rock supporting a road or railroad track
= example: a foundation of earth or rock supporting a road or railroad track
- the flat surface of a printing press on which the type form is laid in the last stage of producing a newspaper or magazine or book etc.
- single thickness of usually some homogeneous substance
= example: single thickness of usually some homogeneous substance
= synonyms: layer
- a stratum of ore or coal thick enough to be mined with profit
= example: a stratum of ore or coal thick enough to be mined with profit
= synonyms: seam
- a depression forming the ground under a body of water
= example: a depression forming the ground under a body of water
= synonyms: bottom
- (geology) a stratum of rock (especially sedimentary rock)
= example: (geology) a stratum of rock (especially sedimentary rock)
verb
- to have sexual intercourse with
= example: to have sexual intercourse with
= synonyms: fuck
- to put to bed
= example: to put to bed
- to place plants in a prepared bed of soil
= example: to place plants in a prepared bed of soil
- to furnish with a bed
= example: to furnish with a bed
